DOC.brief_summary: Test the efficacy and safety of the combination of olmesartan and amlodipine in hypertensive patients whose blood pressure is not adequately controlled with olmesartan alone.
DOC.brief_title: Amlodipine as Add-on to Olmesartan in Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Mean sitting BP of greater than or equal to 140/90115 mmHg and mean 24h dBP greater than or equal to 80 mmHg with at least 30% of daytime readings greater than 85 mmHg prior to randomization. Secondary hypertension of any aetiology; Any serious disorders which may limit the ability to evaluate the efficacy or safety of the test drug(s); History of myocardial infarction, unstable angina pectoris, percutaneous coronary intervention, congestive heart failure, hypertensive encephalopathy, stroke or TIA within the last 6 months.
